put shell(""&soxPath&" "&audFilePath&" -n stat") into myReturn
   -- make sure to put quotes around spaces in paths

Here's the return from the aabove command:

Samples read:            449718
Length (seconds):     28.107375
Scaled by:         2147483647.0
Maximum amplitude:     0.999969
Minimum amplitude:    -0.999969
Midline amplitude:     0.000000
Mean    norm:          0.145530
Mean    amplitude:     0.000291
RMS     amplitude:     0.249847
Maximum delta:         1.316925
Minimum delta:         0.000000
Mean    delta:         0.033336
RMS     delta:         0.064767
Rough   frequency:          660
Volume adjustment:        1.000
